policy.refundNotice: Refunds are offered only if the stream is cancelled or there is a major technical problem on our side.
policy.intro: We offer refunds only in the following cases:
policy.listTechnical: There is a major technical problem on our side that prevents viewing.
policy.manualProcess: Refunds are processed manually. If you believe you are eligible, please contact us via the support form on the concert page or email {email} with your purchase details and the concert name.
policy.minorIssues: For minor issues such as brief buffering or temporary quality fluctuations typical for live streams, refunds are not provided. We will, however, do our best to help you troubleshoot.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We respect your privacy. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights.
privacy.dataWeCollect: We store your user ID from our auth provider when you sign in. If you submit a support report, we store the email you provide with the report.
privacy.useOfData: We use your user ID to authorize access to streams and your email to reply to support reports.
privacy.thirdParties: We use Clerk for authentication and Stripe for payments to operate the platform.
privacy.retention: Support reports (including email) are deleted 30 days after they are received and marked resolved. Ticket records are retained for bookkeeping and compliance.

deletion.title: User Data Deletion
deletion.intro: You can request deletion of your account and personal data.
deletion.howTo: You can delete your account directly in the Clerk account view (user settings). Alternatively, email {email} from the address associated with your account, and we will process your request within 30 days.
deletion.scope: Account deletion removes your personal profile data. We retain ticket records as required for bookkeeping and legal compliance.
